nodes.documentation: Public interface to purchase a card, probablly the most insecure entry point !
nodes.name: buyCard

nodes.documentation: Public interface to get card at no cost
nodes.name: getFreeCard

nodes.documentation: Any user can sacrifice any card they own. Please don't burn down the universe :'(
nodes.name: sacrifice

nodes.documentation: Public interface to buy booster card(s)
nodes.name: buyBoosterCard

nodes.documentation: Public interface to buy booster pack(s) and open them - NO burn option
nodes.name: buyBoosterCardAndOpen

nodes.documentation: Public interface to open already purchased booster pack(s) - User can wager an amount
nodes.name: openBoosterCard

nodes.documentation: Public interface to allow a player to forever link their 1 sponsor
nodes.name: linkMySponsor

nodes.documentation: We always pay our affiliates 20% of the czxp*
nodes.name: rewardAffiliate

nodes.documentation: Private function to diceroll the rarity pull Only from booster packs
nodes.name: getRarity

nodes.documentation: Private Booster distribution function
nodes.name: burnAndBoost

nodes.documentation: Return the timestamp of the next daily bonus for a player*
nodes.name: getTimeToDailyBonus

nodes.documentation: Withdraw balance to wallet*
nodes.name: withdraw
